name: Squeak 'n Seek
description:
2D puzzle game made for Giacomo's birthday!

Help a blind archer collect fruit by chirping at where to shoot arrows.

Features 9 levels, with 15-30 minutes of playtime.

Credits:

  • Hafiz Azman (Fizzd): Game Design, Programming
  • Morphious86: Visual Effects, Programming
  • Kyle Labriola: Art, Animations
  • David Fu: Music, Win & Fail Jingles
  • s9menine: Sound Design, Additional Programming
  • Jenny Crowe: Additional Programming
  • Winston Lee: Playtesting
